com.turnout.ws.controller

Class FriendsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.FriendsController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class FriendsController
extends java.lang.Object
    FriendsController class is front face for accessing, finding and manipulating friends related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FriendsController(FriendsService friendsService)
      An injectable constructor with a dependency of friendsService as argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONObject addfollowUnfollow(org.json.simple.JSONObject friendReq)
      This method used to save friend request data into database.
      org.json.simple.JSONArray findFriends(int userid)
      This method used to get all the friends from database and helps to search the friends based on passed string.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getFriendsList(int ptyid)
      This method will get all the friends information from database based on given party id.

    • Method Detail

      • addfollowUnfollow

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@POST
@Path(value="/followUnfollow")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject addfollowUnfollow(org.json.simple.JSONObject friendReq)
        This method used to save friend request data into database.
        Parameters:
        friendReq - A JSONObject contains information about friend request.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of success or error message.

      • getFriendsList

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/friends/partyid/{ptyid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getFriendsList(@PathParam(value="ptyid")
                                                                       int ptyid)
        This method will get all the friends information from database based on given party id.
        Parameters:
        ptyid - A integer has a value of party id.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject contains all the friends that the party accepted.

      • findFriends

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/findFriends/userid/{userid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray findFriends(@PathParam(value="userid")
                                                                   int userid)
        This method used to get all the friends from database and helps to search the friends based on passed string.
        Parameters:
        userid - A integer has a value of party id.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the friends that the party accepted.
